Interview Vault Privacy Policy:
**Interview Vault Privacy Policy**

Interview Vault respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data.

**Data We Collect:**
- Account information (name, email) for authentication via Supabase
- Resume text for AI-powered skill analysis (stored securely, never shared)
- Job application data you voluntarily enter (company names, statuses, HR contacts)

**How We Use Your Data:**
- To provide personalized job tracking and AI analysis features
- To send email digests and notifications (you can opt out anytime)
- To improve our AI features and user experience

**Data Security:**
- All data is stored securely on Supabase (SOC 2 compliant)
- We use industry-standard encryption for data in transit and at rest
- Your resume and application data are private to your account

**Your Rights:**
- You can export or delete your data at any time
- Contact interviewvault.2026@gmail.com for any privacy requests
Interview Vault Terms of Use:
**Interview Vault Terms of Use**

1. **Acceptance of Terms:** By using Interview Vault, you agree to these terms.

2. **Account Responsibility:** You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials.

3. **Acceptable Use:**
- Use the platform only for legitimate job search activities
- Do not upload malicious content or spam
- Do not attempt to scrape or misuse the service

4. **AI Features:**
- AI-generated content (interview questions, project suggestions, skill analysis) is for guidance only
- We do not guarantee job placement or interview success
- AI responses may occasionally be inaccurate

5. **Content Ownership:**
- You retain ownership of your resume and application data
- We do not sell your data to third parties

6. **Service Availability:**
- We strive for 99% uptime but cannot guarantee uninterrupted service
- We may update features without prior notice
Interview Vault Cookie Policy:
**Interview Vault Cookie Policy**

Interview Vault uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience.

**Essential Cookies:**
- Authentication cookies to keep you logged in
- Session cookies for security

**Analytics Cookies:**
- We may use analytics to understand how users interact with the platform
- This helps us improve features and fix issues

**Managing Cookies:**
- You can disable cookies in your browser settings
- Disabling essential cookies may prevent you from using the platform

**Third-Party Services:**
- Supabase (authentication and database)
- OpenAI (AI features - no personal data shared beyond prompts)
Interview Vault Do Not Sell Policy:
**Interview Vault - Do Not Sell My Personal Information**

Interview Vault does NOT sell your personal information to third parties.

**What We Don't Do:**
- We do not sell your resume data
- We do not sell your job application history
- We do not share your data with advertisers

**California/CCPA Rights:**
- California residents have the right to know what data we collect
- You can request deletion of your data at any time
- Contact interviewvault.2026@gmail.com for requests

**Data Sharing:**
- Your data is only shared with essential service providers (Supabase for database, OpenAI for AI features)
- These providers are bound by strict data processing agreements
Interview Vault Ad Choices:
**Interview Vault Ad Choices**

Interview Vault is an ad-free platform.

**No Advertising:**
- We do not display third-party advertisements
- We do not use your data for targeted advertising
- We do not share your data with ad networks

**Revenue Model:**
- Interview Vault is currently free to use
- Future premium features may be offered as paid subscriptions
- We will never sell your data as a revenue source
